sentences.en: It was not so much offensively we were punished last year, it was defensively.
sentences.cn: 去年我们被罚，今年的这一次并不是像去年那么强的进攻性，而更多的是防御性。

sentences.en: He provides the fight and discipline the Mavs have long needed defensively while also contributing offensively.
sentences.cn: 他为小牛提供了他们长期在防守端所需的斗志和纪律，同时在进攻端做着贡献。

sentences.en: Offensively, what separates this team from prior ones is the number of players skilled at scoring the basketball.
sentences.cn: 进攻上，与更好球队的区别是拥有得分能力的球员数量。
